website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance X-90 fuses both the brand's past and future through its aesthetic, which most reviewers perceive as trendy and attractive. Its sleek one-piece upper displays a contemporary style while the bold midsole and signature cushioning technology are inspired by their 990 series, offering consumers with a hybrid design and time-tested comfort.If you're a New Balance fan and would love to try something different from them, then this pair could be an excellent shoe to consider.
pros: Stylish" and "good-looking" are two of the frequent words used in describing this pair
The shoe is available in a wide selection of colorways
A few practical consumers have said that it is versatile and can be paired with a multitude of ensembles
Most shoe users find the sneaker to be comfortable
One video reviewer especially likes the reflective details on the New Balance X90's upper
Most consumers have commended this pair for having excellent quality
Some wearers appreciate the slip-on function of the upper when putting it on
The New Balance X90 is lightweight which amps up the kick's overall comfort, as others have noted
cons: Several wearers have griped about how stiff the shoe felt at first
Breathability is not very impressive, as per a few reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have very narrow feet but these are still a very tight fit! It's not uncomfortable, but anyone with wide feet would struggle to even get their feet inside them! They are comfortable, and they do look great, but your big toe really shows through the material and because of this I'm wary about how quickly they might wear through because after only a few times of wearing there are slight white patches where the toe sits at the top, not sure if it's to do with wear or the fact I was wearing white socks! For the price though they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Quality trainers for very good price
customer_reviews.text: Glad I didn't pay any attention to the reviews from others aboot these sneakers, my only complaint is they are a wee bit tight getting your foot into them due to the sock design but they are so light and comfy once they're on, that all is forgotten. Absolute class trainers for the £41 pricetag and wouldn't hesitate to recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Jamesyboy38

customer_reviews.title: Buy half cm larger if there is available...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes, fits probably a little smaller than as expected, due to the narrower toe box. However this happens only to your longer foot, but after some days this feeling fades. So if you wear e.g 28cm try half cm larger. If next size is 1cm larger its unknown whether its better to go to it, or to stay to your original size. I got 11uk,initially I thought the right shoe is a bit tight, but over the days the shoe adjusts to the foot.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOS THEODORIDIS

customer_reviews.title: Had better.
customer_reviews.text: These have a fairly cheap feel to them and come large. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: George87

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes, fit well and exceptional comfort, also to top it off price was right and fast delivery. Again New Balance get it right with these.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: With normal fine sock this were small at first after wearing for a week they eased off and now feel comfortable great looking easy to wear .not heavy .
customer_reviews.author: williegoodyear

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says and looks Great
customer_reviews.text: great trainers really comfortable great fit wear them all the time well worth it
customer_reviews.author: steven connal

customer_reviews.title: Just get a half or a size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy. Really snug. I should have gotten a half size bigger. Other than that.... I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Yee

customer_reviews.title: Very fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I love the colourway on these trainers. Very bright and bold
customer_reviews.author: Arman Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up - trust me (and my blisters)!
customer_reviews.text: My normal size but fit is too small if you wear socks. If you don’t wear socks you get massive and very painful blisters!
customer_reviews.author: Arkiteckt

customer_reviews.title: Feels easy and light
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it two days ago and I like it, light and feels easy. Made in china though, but for me it's alright.
customer_reviews.author: Binod Rai

customer_reviews.title: So good I got them twice
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and nice I brought another pair a few days later
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s very comfortable at al I am very disappointed this is first and last time i will buy NB trainer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New trainers
customer_reviews.text: Not for me but for my son whom loves them.
customer_reviews.author: jayne burgess

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful footy. I have been receiving compliments from friends and it it comfortable
